us.title: The Markets And The Uncertainty Principle
us.content: In our country's current state, there are so many current uncertainties that are hard to measure and even harder still to apply to our equity and bond markets. Fear is part of the reason, in my estimation, that the markets have declined.

us.title: Are Stocks Bottoming? Investor Sentiment vs Investing Reality
us.content: The S&P 500 Index (INDEXSP:.INX) and financial markets are trying to climb a wall of worry this week. While sentiment indicators flash red, real-time data on consumer spending, labor markets, and credit conditions suggest a much more stable macro environment.

us.title: US Bitcoin ETFs End Outflow Streak With $744 Million Weekly Influx ‚Äî Details
us.content: The US-based Bitcoin ETFs (exchange-traded funds) have been on a negative streak of capital outflows in the past few weeks, reflecting dwindling appetite and worsening sentiment amongst investors. However, the latest daily performances of these crypto-based financial products suggest that fresh demand might be growing among investors.

us.content: By Kevin Flanagan, Head of Fixed Income Strategy Key Takeaways The Federal Reserve kept rates unchanged for the second consecutive FOMC meeting, signaling a cautious ‚Äúwait and see‚Äù approach amid economic uncertainty and Washington policy concerns.

us.title: Chainlink Poised For Recovery If $13 Support Holds ‚Äì Expert Sets Optimistic Targets
us.content: Chainlink (LINK) is showing signs of strength, trading 27% above its March 11 low and hinting at a potential recovery if broader market conditions improve. Despite recent volatility and ongoing macroeconomic uncertainty, LINK has managed to hold its ground better than many altcoins, giving hope to investors who believe the worst may be over.

france.title: S&P 500 Ends Losing Streak Amid Trade and Fed Uncertainty
france.content:
The S&P 500 snapped a four-week losing streak with a marginal gain on Friday, but market volatility remained elevated as investors navigated trade policy uncertainty and a Federal Reserve policy update.

At the close:

  • Dow Jones Industrial Average: +31 points (+0.1%)

  • S&P 500 Index: +0.04%

  • NASDAQ Composite: +0.5%

Key Market Drivers

1. Trump Signals Flexibility on Reciprocal Tariffs

President Donald Trump said Friday that his administration would show “flexibility” on reciprocal tariffs, which are set to take effect on April 2.

This follows weeks of uncertainty over U.S. trade policy, with shifting rhetoric from the White House causing investor unease. The decision by the European Union (EU) to delay retaliatory tariffs on U.S. whiskey has raised hopes that diplomatic talks may ease tensions between Washington and Brussels.

However, ongoing tariff uncertainty leaves markets vulnerable to further volatility.

2. Mixed Signals from the Federal Reserve

The Federal Reserve left interest rates unchanged this week, as widely expected. However, its updated economic projections sent mixed signals:
‚úÖ Maintained expectations of 50 basis points in rate cuts this year
‚ùå Raised inflation forecasts, which could limit the Fed’s ability to cut rates

The Fed’s uncertainty over the inflationary impact of tariffs adds another layer of complexity to its decision-making. With inflation projected to stay above 2%, traders remain skeptical about how aggressively the Fed will ease policy in 2025.

3. FedEx Stock Plunges on Profit Warning

FedEx (NYSE:FDX) dropped over 6% after cutting its annual profit and revenue forecast. The company cited:

  • Weak U.S. industrial activity

  • Lower-than-expected demand for its services

FedEx’s warning highlights broader economic uncertainty and slowing corporate earnings growth, reinforcing concerns about the resilience of the U.S. economy.

Market Outlook: Monitoring Key Indicators

To track the market’s response to trade and Fed policy, investors should watch technical indicators such as:
üìâ Relative Strength Index (RSI): Identifying overbought/oversold conditions
üìä Moving Averages (50-day & 200-day): Gauging market trends
üìà Volatility Index (VIX): Measuring investor sentiment

For real-time market data, leverage FMP APIs:
‚úÖ S&P 500 Historical Data API (Track index trends & price movements)
‚úÖ Economic Calendar API (Stay updated on key economic events like Fed decisions & tariffs)

Final Thoughts

Despite snapping a losing streak, the S&P 500 remains in a fragile state, with trade uncertainties and Fed policy shifts keeping investors on edge. With April 2 tariff deadlines and earnings season approaching, volatility is likely to persist.

Key Watchpoints for Next Week:

üîπ Fed officials’ speeches & inflation data
üîπ Updates on U.S.-EU trade negotiations
üîπ Corporate earnings guidance (especially in the industrial & tech sectors)

france.title: The bull market isn't over yet: Why the market correction is actually a buying opportunity
france.content: Despite worries about the impact of US President Donald Trump's tariff policies and concerns about the healing of the economy fueling market volatility (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC), EVERCORE ISI senior managing director of equity, derivatives, and quantitative strategy Julian Emanuel says the bull market has room to run, and downturns are buying opportunities. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here: https://finance.yahoo.com/videos/series/market-domination-overtime/ #stocks #investing #news About Yahoo Finance: Yahoo Finance provides free stock ticker data, up-to-date news, portfolio management resources, comprehensive market data, advanced tools, and more information to help you manage your financial life.

france.title: NerdWallet: A Diverse And Growing Business
france.content: NerdWallet, a founder-led company, is expanding into new verticals and geographies, growing its user base, and increasing revenues despite recent stock under-performance. The company shows strong revenue growth, has no long-term debt, and at a promising valuation, makes it an attractive buy during this market correction. Risks include competition from social media and AI, but NerdWallet's reliable content and marketplace experience offer a competitive edge.

france.title: Saylor hints at impending BTC purchase after latest capital raise
france.content: Strategy co-founder Michael Saylor hinted at an impending Bitcoin (BTC) purchase after the company raised additional capital this week through its latest preferred stock offering.The executive posted the Sunday Bitcoin chart on X that signals another BTC acquisition the next day ‚Äî when traditional financial markets open ‚Äî with the playful message "needs more orange." According to SaylorTracker, the company's most recent BTC acquisition occurred on March 17, when Strategy purchased 130 BTC, valued at $10.7 million, bringing its total holdings to 499,226 BTC.

france.title: Ethereum eyes 65% gains from 'cycle bottom' as BlackRock ETH stash crosses $1B
france.content: Ethereum's native token, Ether (ETH), has lost half of its value in the past three months, crashing from $4,100 in December 2024 to as low as around $1,750 in March 2025. Nevertheless, it is now well-positioned for a sharp price rebound.65% ETH price rebound in play by June From a technical standpoint, Ether's price is eyeing a potential breakout as it retests a long-term support zone.

france.title: The Stock Market Faces An Economic Reality Check
france.content: Earnings for 2025 are declining, leading to lower expected growth rates and increased vulnerability for the S&P 500, potentially exceeding a 10% decline. Historical trends indicate that the S&P 500 is significantly overvalued, with current PE ratios not justified by lower earnings growth rates.

france.title: PDD Holdings: Reset Expectations, Seize Growth Amid Challenges
france.content: PDD's Q4-24 revenue and EBIT missed consensus due to lower transaction service revenue, but online marketing service revenue was in line. Despite Temu's slower growth, PDD's domestic e-commerce and grocery delivery business remain strong, supporting a bullish outlook. PDD's valuation is compelling at 8x forward EBITDA, implying $170/share or 35% upside, trading at a discount to peers like BABA and AMZN.
